resources.string: You cannot use any characters other than English characters and special characters "@,., _, -" in the email field.
"The first character cannot be the symbol '%1$s'"
"'%1$s' symbols cannot be placed next to each other"
"İsim ya da soyisim alanında ingilizce karakterler ile türkçe karakterler haricinde bir karakter kullanılamaz"
Cannot use more than %1$s identical characters
Cannot use more than %1$s vowels together
Cannot use more than %1$s consonants together
